description: This course involves a study of the nature, goals & structure of private law remedies & is organised around the remedial goals of performance, reparation & restitution & consideration of other grounds, such as punishment.
prerequisites: All Level 1 LAWS courses + LAWS2111 + LAWS2112 + LAWS3113
restricted: LLB(Hons)(#64), LLB(Hons)(#48), LLB(Hons)#64 duals, LLB, LLB duals and LLB (Graduate Entry) programs.
